event.title: TCG Collecting

event.content: Made Friends with and worked with FIT, LIM, and NYFA artists, while pursuing Business Psychology. Studied Liberal Arts as a Minor.

event.title: Frequented Art Galleries of NYC
event.content: Day Dreamed of Owning a Peter Lik, visited modern galleries, and visited museums with collegues. Drank at pubs centered around the times.
